question: How did the state of the puzzel piece change?
options: The puzzle piece was turned on its side and inserted into the puzzle border, causing misalignment.
The puzzle piece was placed on the side and inserted into the puzzle board, pushing the other pieces out of the board.
The puzzle piece was positioned on the corner and forced into the board, resulting in a gap.

The puzzle piece was laid flat and inserted into the incorrect section of the board.
